Only the first coordinates coincide (closely) with the non-reversed case, after that there is a difference in coordinates
the first coordinate of the 20nObservations (non-reversed) is (0.6860000000000009 0.7235304000000031) and the 
pre last of the reversed is (0.8039111625013972 0.5844523940940003) the dist of this two vectors is 0.18233412727523288
which is a bigger difference compared to the problem1 20nObservations difference
